Message.SourceString:
Happogahara is a course with a
mix of uphill and downhill sections‥
Message.LocalizedString:
Happogahara is a course with a
mix of uphill and downhill sections‥

Message.SourceString:
Don't be fooled by the appearance,
be conscious of running at your own rhythm‥
Message.LocalizedString:
Don't be fooled by the appearance,
be conscious of running at your own rhythm‥

Message.SourceString:
I wonder why‥ 
I have certain expectations of you‥
Message.LocalizedString:
I wonder why‥ 
I have certain expectations of you‥

Message.SourceString:
Will you become a racer
who defeats Project D‥
Message.LocalizedString:
Will you become a racer
who defeats Project D‥

Message.SourceString:
Or perhaps‥ You'll be a
stepping stone to further their growth‥
Message.LocalizedString:
Or perhaps‥ You'll be a
stepping stone to further their growth‥

Message.SourceString: Either way‥
Message.LocalizedString: Either way‥

Message.SourceString:
Ryosuke's reason for keeping
an eye on you becomes clear‥
Message.LocalizedString:
Ryosuke's reason for keeping
an eye on you becomes clear‥

Message.SourceString:
This four-way hairpin has a wide
road width‥ The approach line is free‥
Message.LocalizedString:
This four-way hairpin has a wide
road width‥ The approach line is free‥

Message.SourceString:
Naturally, it becomes a
decisive corner‥ remember that‥
Message.LocalizedString:
Naturally, it becomes a
decisive corner‥ remember that‥

Message.SourceString:
Now‥ you should have
grasped the rhythm by now‥
Message.LocalizedString:
Now‥ you should have
grasped the rhythm by now‥

Message.SourceString: This is where it gets real‥‼
Message.LocalizedString: This is where it gets real‥‼

Message.SourceString: Ugh‥‼ Let's pass him here‥‼
Message.LocalizedString: Ugh‥‼ Let's pass him here‥‼

Message.SourceString: Can I stay focuses until the end‥⁉
Message.LocalizedString: Can I stay focuses until the end‥⁉

Message.SourceString:
According to Ryosuke, Tōdō Juku
seems to be Sparta's doratech training dojo‥
Message.LocalizedString:
According to Ryosuke, Tōdō Juku
seems to be Sparta's doratech training dojo‥

Message.SourceString: I used to be a student there‥
Message.LocalizedString: I used to be a student there‥

Message.SourceString:
My classmate lost to Akina's
Hachi Roku on this mountain pass‥
Message.LocalizedString:
My classmate lost to Akina's
Hachi Roku on this mountain pass‥

Message.SourceString: He stood out even among the alumni‥
Message.LocalizedString: He stood out even among the alumni‥

Message.SourceString: It's scary‥ Project D is‥
Message.LocalizedString: It's scary‥ Project D is‥

Message.SourceString: Why are you on the road again‥
Message.LocalizedString: Why are you on the road again‥

Message.SourceString: You're acting so weird‥ Kyoichi
Message.LocalizedString: You're acting so weird‥ Kyoichi

Message.SourceString: Ah‼ When did this happen‥
Message.LocalizedString: Ah‼ When did this happen‥

Message.SourceString:
Don't be upset‥
We don't know eachother‥
Message.LocalizedString:
Don't be upset‥
We don't know eachother‥

Message.SourceString:
Damn‥ I never thought I'd be
able to drive with you on the road again‥
Message.LocalizedString:
Damn‥ I never thought I'd be
able to drive with you on the road again‥

Message.SourceString: Fine‥ don't underestimate my Evo
Message.LocalizedString: Fine‥ don't underestimate my Evo

Message.SourceString: Come on‥ I have to‥
Message.LocalizedString: Come on‥ I have to‥

Message.SourceString: So fast‥ he truly is exceptional‥
Message.LocalizedString: So fast‥ he truly is exceptional‥

Message.SourceString:
The tires are losing
grip due to the first run‥
Message.LocalizedString:
The tires are losing
grip due to the first run‥

Message.SourceString: So far‥
Message.LocalizedString: So far‥

Message.SourceString: Now, let's go
Message.LocalizedString: Now, let's go

Message.SourceString: Hehe‥ I'm looking forward to this‥
Message.LocalizedString: Hehe‥ I'm looking forward to this‥

Message.SourceString:
I can't keep up with the
rhythm with Sakai behind me‥
Message.LocalizedString:
I can't keep up with the
rhythm with Sakai behind me‥

Message.SourceString: Hey hey‥ I can't stand it‥
Message.LocalizedString: Hey hey‥ I can't stand it‥

Message.SourceString:
Don't relax just
because it's practice‥
Message.LocalizedString:
Don't relax just
because it's practice‥

Message.SourceString: Damn‥ Sakai is as brutal as ever‥
Message.LocalizedString: Damn‥ Sakai is as brutal as ever‥

Message.SourceString:
That guy‥ even when trailing behind
Sakai, the rhythm remains undisturbed‥
Message.LocalizedString:
That guy‥ even when trailing behind
Sakai, the rhythm remains undisturbed‥

Message.SourceString: Heh‥ seems like he's quite skilled
Message.LocalizedString: Heh‥ seems like he's quite skilled

Message.SourceString:
‥Your consciousness is
distracted, Daiki
Message.LocalizedString:
‥Your consciousness is
distracted, Daiki

Message.SourceString: Oh no‼
Message.LocalizedString: Oh no‼

Message.SourceString: Tsk‥ We're not done yet‥‼
Message.LocalizedString: Tsk‥ We're not done yet‥‼

Message.SourceString: This is it‥‼
Message.LocalizedString: This is it‥‼

Message.SourceString: ‥Tch‼
Message.LocalizedString: ‥Tch‼

Message.SourceString:
If I can overtake Sakai,
victory is mine‥‼
Message.LocalizedString:
If I can overtake Sakai,
victory is mine‥‼

Message.SourceString:
Too naive, Daiki‥ There's no
way I'll let you get away like this‥
Message.LocalizedString:
Too naive, Daiki‥ There's no
way I'll let you get away like this‥

Message.SourceString: ‥What⁉
Message.LocalizedString: ‥What⁉

Message.SourceString:
Sakai was overtaken‥⁉
What's going on⁉
Message.LocalizedString:
Sakai was overtaken‥⁉
What's going on⁉

Message.SourceString: ‥That's up to me⁉
Message.LocalizedString: ‥That's up to me⁉

Message.SourceString:
Heh‥ I'll show you the
cunningness of Tōdō Juku‥
Message.LocalizedString:
Heh‥ I'll show you the
cunningness of Tōdō Juku‥

Message.SourceString: Impressive‥ you're a good driver‥
Message.LocalizedString: Impressive‥ you're a good driver‥

Message.SourceString:
You've managed to keep up by
grasping my line and timing‥
Message.LocalizedString:
You've managed to keep up by
grasping my line and timing‥

Message.SourceString: But‥ that will be your downfall‼
Message.LocalizedString: But‥ that will be your downfall‼

Message.SourceString: It's blue‥
Message.LocalizedString: It's blue‥

Message.SourceString:
Feinting with the brake lights
 is a routine at Tōdō Juku
Message.LocalizedString:
Feinting with the brake lights
 is a routine at Tōdō Juku

Message.SourceString:
Just competing in speed cleanly
isn't what battles are about‼
Message.LocalizedString:
Just competing in speed cleanly
isn't what battles are about‼

Message.SourceString:
Outsmarting the enemy's rhythm is
Tōdō Juku's style of battle‼
Message.LocalizedString:
Outsmarting the enemy's rhythm is
Tōdō Juku's style of battle‼

Message.SourceString: Oh my god‥ they're catching up⁉
Message.LocalizedString: Oh my god‥ they're catching up⁉

Message.SourceString: What・the・heck・is・happening⁉
Message.LocalizedString: What・the・heck・is・happening⁉

Message.SourceString:
I'm defeated‥ They took
advantage of my moment‥
Message.LocalizedString:
I'm defeated‥ They took
advantage of my moment‥

Message.SourceString: At a point where the front tires lacked traction‥
Message.LocalizedString: At a point where the front tires lacked traction‥

Message.SourceString: What a guy‥‼
Message.LocalizedString: What a guy‥‼

Message.SourceString:
‥I've decided to thoroughly
devote myself to this car.
Message.LocalizedString:
‥I've decided to thoroughly
devote myself to this car.

Message.SourceString:
I don't want to loose against
the Integra Type R twice‥‼
Message.LocalizedString:
I don't want to loose against
the Integra Type R twice‥‼

Message.SourceString:
Don't think you can
get away with this‥‼
Message.LocalizedString:
Don't think you can
get away with this‥‼

Message.SourceString: Oh my god‥‼ I can't make the leap‥‼
Message.LocalizedString: Oh my god‥‼ I can't make the leap‥‼

Message.SourceString:
I chose to follow you because
I'm interested in your skills‥
Message.LocalizedString:
I chose to follow you because
I'm interested in your skills‥

Message.SourceString:
Now, let's go
Let's start
Message.LocalizedString:
Now, let's go
Let's start

Message.SourceString: Let's see how good you are‥‼
Message.LocalizedString: Let's see how good you are‥‼

Message.SourceString: You're good‥‼
Message.LocalizedString: You're good‥‼

Message.SourceString:
No wonder Sakai
was caught flat-footed‼
Message.LocalizedString:
No wonder Sakai
was caught flat-footed‼

Message.SourceString: It's true that I lost to Project D‥
Message.LocalizedString: It's true that I lost to Project D‥

Message.SourceString:
But that doesn't
mean it ends there‥
Message.LocalizedString:
But that doesn't
mean it ends there‥

Message.SourceString:
Reflect on why you lost‥
and use that to move forward‥
Message.LocalizedString:
Reflect on why you lost‥
and use that to move forward‥

Message.SourceString: That is the spirit of Tōdō Juku‥‼
Message.LocalizedString: That is the spirit of Tōdō Juku‥‼

Message.SourceString: ‥Tch‼ Here‼
Message.LocalizedString: ‥Tch‼ Here‼

Message.SourceString:
I'll widen the
gap just like this‥‼
Message.LocalizedString:
I'll widen the
gap just like this‥‼

Message.SourceString: There's no way you can keep up‥
Message.LocalizedString: There's no way you can keep up‥

Message.SourceString: Why are you there‥⁉
Message.LocalizedString: Why are you there‥⁉

Message.SourceString: Wha‥ t‥ is‥ th‥ at‥
Message.LocalizedString: Wha‥ t‥ is‥ th‥ at‥

Message.SourceString: Not yet‥‼
Message.LocalizedString: Not yet‥‼

Message.SourceString:
Apply pressure right at the
edge to create an opportunity‥‼
Message.LocalizedString:
Apply pressure right at the
edge to create an opportunity‥‼

Message.SourceString:
It's worth watching how
much pressure you can endure‼
Message.LocalizedString:
It's worth watching how
much pressure you can endure‼

No matter how much pressure is
applied, there's no response‥⁉
Message.LocalizedString:
No matter how much pressure is
applied, there's no response‥⁉

Message.LocalizedString: What am I doing‥
